metadata.Title: CVE-2019-3806 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low
metadata.Description:
An issue has been found in PowerDNS Recursor versions after 4.1.3 before4.1.9 where Lua hooks are not properly applied to queries received over TCPin some specific combination of settings, possibly bypassing securitypolicies enforced using Lua.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-3806` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

pdns-recursor - 4.1.9-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: pdns-recursor package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.1.9-1').
